document.title: Phoebius Roadmap
document.abstract: Phoebius framework in its current state already provides an innovative implementation of features-in-demand, but besides them we have a lot of other ideas for improving the product and extending the feature list. The source code repository is currently unpublished, but if you wish to participate in development, feel free to contact us.

body.p:
v1.2.1 is planned to be released at December 1, 2009, and will feature:
readonly container
enum code generator
v1.2.2 will introduce the distributed cache layer over data access objects for speeding up the process of assembling the ORM entites
The development branches are introduced to support the implementation of huge long-run features.
